actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of the Army to award a combat armor badge to armor soldiers of the Army, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to award a combat armor badge to any armor soldier who was assigned or attached to an Army armored, cavalry, or reconnaissance unit while such unit was engaged in combat operations against an enemy force.
